ext_description.p: A Thermal_isolation_removal_template is a type of that describes the shape of material to be removed from a feature. The purposes predefined in this part of ISO 10303 include electrical and thermal isolation.
ext_description.example: Figure illustrates a template and associated parameters designed for electrical isolation. For a specific template, values will be assigned for the parameters and the explicit geometry will be representative of the assigned parameter values.

Figure illustrates a template and associated parameters designed for thermal isolation. For a specific template, values will be assigned for the parameters and the explicit geometry will be representative of the assigned parameter values. In this example, an instance would be a complex instance including and Thermal_isolation_removal_template.

figure.title: Thermal_isolation_removal_template supports thermal isolation and electrical conduction
